thread.title: Deepika Padukone, Neha Dhupia & Soha Ali Khan make heads turn with their stunning style statements!
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone, Neha Dhupia & Soha Ali Khan make heads turn with their stunning style statements!

author: Nirupama Chaudhary
title: Deepika Padukone, Neha Dhupia & Soha Ali Khan make heads turn with their stunning style statements!
text:
Deepika Padukone, Neha Dhupia & Soha Ali Khan make heads turn with their stunning style statements! And looked drop-dead gorgeous as ever! By Nirupama Chaudhary | Published: February 24, 2017 10:21 AM IST Comments Tinsel town celebs love to inspire people with their style statements. Brand endorsements are a norm in Bollywood and these stars put out their most stylish foot forward at events. Recently, three gorgeous divas of B-town were snapped at the launch of Gillette Venus Breeze, Deepika Padukone , Neha Dhupia and Soha Ali Khan . Busting the myth that shaving isn’t a good option, these ladies pushed the envelope and made a strong point by flaunting their glossy and glistening skin. Looking every bit sophisticated in their designer ensembles, the ladies interacted with the media too. Deepika Padukone, who has attained global stardom following her Hollywood debut with Vin Diesel, xXx: Return of Xander Cage refuted rumors of attending the Oscars and maintaining her no-replies, she also denied doing a remake of Mr & Mrs. Smith On the professional front, apart from brand endorsements, Deepika Padukone is currently shooting for Sanjay Leela Bhansali ‘s magnum opus, Padmavati opposite Shahid Kapoor and beau Ranveer Singh . Neha Dhupia is all set to make her Koffee debut on Koffee With Karan in a special episode soon. Capturing our fashion conscious minds with their elegant looks, the ladies made for a pretty picture with their magenta, blue and slate grey ensembles. In sync with the theme of the show, the ladies dressed to nines in ensembles that showcased their toned legs and chose to draw attention to it, keeping the top half simple. Here’s what the ladies wore. What Deepika Padukone Wore A post shared by Shaleena Nathani (@shaleenanathani) on Feb 23, 2017 at 2:15am PST 
Doing denim with her denim dress by the South Africas based designer, Dionne Campbell –Young, Deepika slipped into multi-hued Dolce & Gabbana sandals that added a luxurious panache to her look. ( Deepika Padukone looks ravishing in red as she accepts The Priceless Princess Award !) 
She chose an earthy makeup of delicately done eyes and nude pink lips, leaving her long tresses open. What Soha Ali Khan Wore 
A post shared by Soha (@sakpataudi) on Feb 23, 2017 at 5:28am PST Wearing a custom signature rose dress by Amy Billimoria, Soha looked resplendent with her hair styled in perfect waves in a side-swept manner. She chose a demure pair of earrings and slipped into a nude pair of pumps. A subtle makeup of delicately done eyes and nude pink lips rounded up her look. What Neha Dhupia Wore Keeping things simple and non-fussy, Neha chose a slate-grey colored midi with a pair of stunning black heels. With a statement ring as her only accessory of choice, Neha’s tousled hair and barely-there makeup, Neha let her heels steal the show! ( Style Exclusive: Malaika Arora Khan and Neha Dhupia to sizzle on the latest episode of Koffee With Karan! ) Buzz Style Verdict Needless to say, all the three ladies brought with them a flair of elegance and shone. Rating While we are besotted with Deepika’s dress and sandals, we absolutely loved Soha’s dress and Neha’s heels! All three ladies scored a perfect 5/5 rating. Published Date: February 24, 2017 10:21 AM IST
